name: Song Bird
description:
Can you decipher the melodies of the forest?

Listen to the birds closely and play back their two melodies on your flute before the day is over!

CONTROLS:

MUSIC NOTES:GAMEBOY:KEYBOARD:F♯ (octave)[A] + [UP] (hold together)[Z] + [UP ARROW] (hold together)F♮(octave)
[A][Z]E[A] + [DOWN] (hold together)[Z] + [DOWN ARROW] (hold together)D[UP][UP ARROW]C[RIGHT][RIGHT ARROW]B♭[B] + [UP] (hold together)[X] + [UP ARROW] (hold together)A♮[B][X]A♭[B] + [DOWN] (hold together)[X] + [DOWN] (hold together)G[LEFT]
[LEFT ARROW]F[DOWN][DOWN ARROW]

All assets/designs are original and created during and for the GameBoy Showdown 2022 game jam.

Download and play on real GameBoy Color Hardware!
